gold.user: User requests to retrieve all issue security schemes available in the Jira Cloud platform.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of issue security schemes with their details.

gold.user: User wants to create a new issue security scheme with specific configurations.
gold.ideal: Creates a new issue security scheme and returns its details.

gold.user: User requests to get all available security levels for issue security schemes.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of security levels with their descriptions.

gold.user: User wants to set default security levels for issue security schemes.
gold.ideal: Updates the default security levels and confirms the changes.

gold.user: User requests to retrieve members associated with specific security levels.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of members for the specified security levels.

gold.user: User wants to find projects that are using specific issue security schemes.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of projects associated with the specified security schemes.

gold.user: User wants to associate existing security schemes with specific projects.
gold.ideal: Associates the specified security schemes to the projects and confirms the action.

gold.user: User requests to search for specific issue security schemes based on criteria.
gold.ideal: Returns a filtered list of issue security schemes matching the search criteria.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve details of a specific issue security scheme by its ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified issue security scheme.

gold.user: User wants to update the details of an existing issue security scheme.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified issue security scheme and returns the updated details.

gold.user: User requests to delete a specific issue security scheme by its ID.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified issue security scheme and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: User wants to add a new security level to an existing issue security scheme.
gold.ideal: Adds the new security level to the specified scheme and returns the updated scheme.

gold.user: User requests to remove a specific security level from an issue security scheme.
gold.ideal: Removes the specified security level and confirms the action.

gold.user: User wants to update the details of a specific security level.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified security level and returns the updated details.

gold.user: User wants to add members to a specific security level in an issue security scheme.
gold.ideal: Adds the specified members to the security level and confirms the addition.

gold.user: User requests to remove a specific member from a security level.
gold.ideal: Removes the specified member from the security level and confirms the removal.
